Package vtracker.data

Class TextDatabase

java.lang.Object
vtracker.data.TextDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
VtrackerDatabase
public class TextDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
implements VtrackerDatabase
Database using text file. Converts Match objects to and from text representation and implements database operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addMatch​(Match match)
    Adds new match to the database.
    boolean deleteDatabase()
    Deletes database.
    boolean deleteLatestMatch()
    Deletes latest match.
    static TextDatabase getInstance​(java.lang.String path)
    Returns a TextDatabase instance.
    Match getLatestMatch()
    Returns a Match object representing latest match from the database.
    java.util.ArrayList<Match> getMatches()
    Returns an ArrayList of Match objects from the database.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • getInstance

      public static TextDatabase getInstance​(java.lang.String path)
      Returns a TextDatabase instance. Creates database object once and returns a reference if database object already exists.
      Parameters:
      path - a string representing the path of the database file
      Returns:
      a TextDatabase instance
